abstract: Carl C. Icahn has a added a little more leverage to his position on BEA Systems, the business software maker that he is urging to sell itself. The activist investor increased his stake for the second time in two weeks, to 9.88 percent.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn has a added a little more leverage to his position on BEA Systems, the business software maker that he is urging to sell itself. The activist investor increased his stake for the second time in two weeks, to 9.88 percent.

headline.main: Icahn Again Raises Stake in BEA Systems
